# predict.christmas — Christmas & Holidays Prediction Markets

> Real-time prediction markets for christmas & holidays. Bet on outcomes, see live odds, and win. Free to play with shared pools powered by Firebase.


predict.christmas is a prediction market platform focused on christmas & holidays. Users can bet YES or NO on curated markets with real-time shared pools. Features live odds, countdown timers, trending markets, and social sharing. Part of the Predict Network — 18 niche prediction market sites.


## Pages

- [Homepage — Christmas & Holidays prediction markets with live odds](https://predict.christmas)
- [Markets — Active christmas & holidays prediction markets](https://predict.christmas#markets)


## Keywords

prediction market, christmas & holidays, betting, odds, forecast, predict.christmas
